definition: to fish with a hook and bait

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Today the lake is a year-round paradise for the fishermen.
sentences.chinese: 現在這個湖是釣魚者一年四季的天堂。

sentences.english: Hooked without a permit, a dorado —sold as mahi-mahi—was caught on an illegal longline off Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 一條劍魚被墨西哥的非法釣魚者用延繩釣捕獲了。

sentences.english: The site currently markets and sells fishing tackle of all types to enthusiastic sport fishermen.
sentences.chinese: 站點目前向專業的釣魚者推廣和銷售各種釣具。
他可是個熱情的釣魚者。
